items: No more post-its on the rear-view mirror

features.lead: Superpowers for people who can't do it all

cards.title: Unlimited automatic reminders
cards.body: One-off or recurring. Weekly, monthly, with excuses or without mercy. Whatever, whenever — as many times as needed.

cards.title: All your calendars in a single chat
cards.body: Google, Outlook, Apple. Your appointments, events and tasks connected. Nothing slips through. Not even if you try.

cards.title: Lists that never get lost
cards.body: Tasks, errands, ideas — dictate them, type them, or just drop them. However you do it, your list is saved.

cards.title: Unlimited voice notes that become tasks
cards.body: Your voice is enough. Memorae listens, transcribes and organizes what you say. That easy.

cards.title: Smart searches, without leaving WhatsApp
cards.body: Questions? Data? Ideas? Ask in WhatsApp. Get thoughtful answers, powered by integrated ChatGPT and DeepSeek.

cards.title: From photo to reminder
cards.body: Snap what you want to remember — a whiteboard, a post-it, a scribbled sheet. If you can read it, Memorae can too.
